attributes.action: Reverse the further 4 years public sector pay rise 1% cap.
attributes.background: Public sector workers are worse off financially than they were five years ago having been awarded 0% or 1% pay rises whilst inflation has devalued their pay over the last 5 years.  It is unacceptable for MPs to accept a 10 % pay rise whilst the public sector suffers. "We are all in it together".

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104399 
You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
